sentences.en: Considering his ill health, they begged him off.
sentences.cn: 他们考虑到他身体不好, 请他别做了.

sentences.en: Considering the strength of the opposition, we did very well to score two goals.
sentences.cn: 考虑到对方实力强大，我们能攻进两球已经很不错了。

sentences.en: He is considering the disposition of furniture in his new house.
sentences.cn: 他在考虑怎样在新居中布置家具.

sentences.en: He was considering the idea from all angles.
sentences.cn: 他正从各个角度考虑这个想法。

sentences.en: I think you're pretty safe, considering.
sentences.cn: 总的说来，我认为你的处境很安全。

sentences.en: In considering a problem, one mustn't mistake the nonessentials for the essentials.
sentences.cn: 看问题时, 不要把支流当作主流.

sentences.en: Is he really considering a renewal of hostilities at this stage?
sentences.cn: 他真的在考虑在这个阶段恢复敌对状态吗？

sentences.en: She's very active, considering her age.
sentences.cn: 就她的年龄来说，她是十分活跃的。

sentences.en: The council is considering whether to approve of the use of firearms.
sentences.cn: 政务委员会正在考虑是否要批准动用武器。

sentences.en: The former hostage is in remarkably good shape considering his ordeal.
sentences.cn: 想想人质曾遭受的折磨，获救后其身体状况已经是出奇地好了。

sentences.en: The German authorities are considering an airlift if the situation becomes critical.
sentences.cn: 如果局势变得危急，德国当局将考虑实施空运。

sentences.en: The Home Secretary is considering a new law against stalking.
sentences.cn: 内务大臣正考虑制定一项针对跟踪骚扰的新法律。

sentences.en: Too many young people hurry into marriage without considering the responsibilities.
sentences.cn: 有太多的年轻人不考虑他们要负的责任,就匆匆忙忙地结婚了.

sentences.en: We are considering the options available to us in this no-win situation.
sentences.cn: 在这种取胜无望的情形下，我们在考虑有什么选择。

sentences.en: We trust that he and his department are considering our suggestion.
sentences.cn: 我们估计他和他的部门正在考虑我们的建议。

sentences.en: Yes, her speed was quite good, considering.
sentences.cn: 不错, 从各个方面来看, 她的速度相当快.

words.tran_cn: 就...而论,照...说来,与...比起来

trans.tran_en: used to say that you are thinking about a particular fact when you are giving your opinion

trans.tran_cn: 认为，考虑（ consider的现在分词）
trans.tran_en: used after you have given an opinion, to say that something is true in spite of a situation that makes it seem surprising
